name: !Another Chance
description:
Controls:
Move: Left-A, Right-D, Jump - Space
Talk - E
Cut- C

A short narrative game about starting with nothing ;) You are in hell and you find the Devil by chance and ask him for another shot at life. :D

We had fun making it, and hope to get some comments on what we should focus to improve.

Programmers: Alex, Jovan
Graphics: Alex, Jovan, Ren (Programmer Art :D )
Animation: Alex
Audio: Ren
Story: Ren, Alex, Jovan
